name: Easy Tandoori Chicken Pizza
author: Philadelphia Cooking Creme
summary: Chicken strips coated in a creamy tandoori sauce and quickly pan-fried are a zesty topping for these flatbread pizzas with red onions, more creamy topping, and fresh arugula and cilantro.
ingredients: 1 (270 g) tub PHILADELPHIA Savoury Garlic Cooking Creme Cream Cheese Product, divided
½ pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
1 (250 g) package naan breads (2 breads per 250g package)
½ cup thinly sliced red onions
directions: Cooking Creme and tandoori paste in medium bowl
Heat oil in medium nonstick skillet on medium-high heat, Add chicken mixture; cook and stir 5 min
Combine chili sauce and tomato paste; spread onto bread
Top with onions and chicken; place directly on oven rack
or until pizzas start to brown around edges
Top with spoonfuls of remaining Cooking Creme; bake 2 min
